Rule.NonCompliantComment: LimitRequestLine is set to a value greater than 8190, increasing the risk of buffer overflow attacks.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set the LimitRequestLine directive to 8190 or less.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: LimitRequestFields is set to a value greater than 100, which may allow excessive header fields.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set the LimitRequestFields directive to 100 or less.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: LimitRequestFieldsize is set to a value greater than 1024, potentially exposing the server to large header attacks.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set the LimitRequestFieldsize directive to 1024 or less.

Rule.NonCompliantComment: LimitRequestBody is set to a value greater than 102400, which may allow oversized requests.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set the LimitRequestBody directive to 102400 or less.
